original_text: And stand in the Holy Place according to the groupings of the fathers' houses of your brothers the lay people, and according to the division of the Levites by fathers' household.
korean_text: 너희 형제 모든 백성의 족속의 서열대로 또는 레위 족속의 서열대로 성소에 서서

sentences.original_text: And stand in the Holy Place
according to the groupings of the fathers' houses
of your brothers the lay people
and according to the division of the Levites
